name: Almost Tennis
description:
Almost Tennis is like tennis, but not quite.
  • Fight a gauntlet of 10 different enemies, from friendly neighbors, like Tall Hat Tim, all the way to tech billionaires, like Mark Zuckerberg.
  • Play as three different classes, each with their own unique abilities.
  • Become the Almost Tennis champion!

Controls:

  • Left + Right to Move
  • A to Swing
  • B to Use Special Ability

Updates:

  • 1.1
    • Added crank to swing (adjust sensitivity in menu)
    • Added shaking Playdate to use ability (adjust sensitivity in menu)

Credits:

  • TiM (Dani Maccari) - https://dani-maccari.itch.io/player-animations-tim
  • 1-bit Icons (Vector Pixel Star) - https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/1-bit-icons
  • Music (Tallbeard Studios) - https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
  • Lobster Font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Lobster
  • m5x7 Font (Daniel Linssen) - https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
  • Juice FX - https://codemanu.itch.io/juicefx
  • Pixel Fx Designer - https://codemanu.itch.io/particle-fx-designer
